38 // \brief An output stream that writes to a resizable buffer
39 class ARROW_EXPORT BufferOutputStream : public OutputStream {
40  public:
41  explicit BufferOutputStream(const std::shared_ptr<ResizableBuffer>& buffer);
42 
49  static Status Create(int64_t initial_capacity, MemoryPool* pool,
50  std::shared_ptr<BufferOutputStream>* out);
51 
52  ~BufferOutputStream() override;
53 
54  // Implement the OutputStream interface
55  Status Close() override;
56  Status Tell(int64_t* position) const override;
57  Status Write(const void* data, int64_t nbytes) override;
58 
59  using OutputStream::Write;
60 
62  Status Finish(std::shared_ptr<Buffer>* result);
63 
69  Status Reset(int64_t initial_capacity = 1024, MemoryPool* pool = default_memory_pool());
70 
71  int64_t capacity() const { return capacity_; }
72 
73  private:
74  BufferOutputStream();
75 
76  // Ensures there is sufficient space available to write nbytes
77  Status Reserve(int64_t nbytes);
78 
79  std::shared_ptr<ResizableBuffer> buffer_;
80  bool is_open_;
81  int64_t capacity_;
82  int64_t position_;
83  uint8_t* mutable_data_;
84 };

86 // \brief A helper class to tracks the size of allocations
87 class ARROW_EXPORT MockOutputStream : public OutputStream {
88  public:
89  MockOutputStream() : extent_bytes_written_(0) {}
90 
91  // Implement the OutputStream interface
92  Status Close() override;
93  Status Tell(int64_t* position) const override;
94  Status Write(const void* data, int64_t nbytes) override;
95 
96  int64_t GetExtentBytesWritten() const { return extent_bytes_written_; }
97 
98  private:
99  int64_t extent_bytes_written_;
100 };

103 class ARROW_EXPORT FixedSizeBufferWriter : public WritableFile {
104  public:
106  explicit FixedSizeBufferWriter(const std::shared_ptr<Buffer>& buffer);
107  ~FixedSizeBufferWriter() override;
108 
109  Status Close() override;
110  Status Seek(int64_t position) override;
111  Status Tell(int64_t* position) const override;
112  Status Write(const void* data, int64_t nbytes) override;
113  Status WriteAt(int64_t position, const void* data, int64_t nbytes) override;
114 
115  void set_memcopy_threads(int num_threads);
116  void set_memcopy_blocksize(int64_t blocksize);
117  void set_memcopy_threshold(int64_t threshold);
118 
119  protected:
120  class FixedSizeBufferWriterImpl;
121  std::unique_ptr<FixedSizeBufferWriterImpl> impl_;
122 };

126 class ARROW_EXPORT BufferReader : public RandomAccessFile {
127  public:
128  explicit BufferReader(const std::shared_ptr<Buffer>& buffer);
129  explicit BufferReader(const Buffer& buffer);
130  BufferReader(const uint8_t* data, int64_t size);
131 
132  Status Close() override;
133  Status Tell(int64_t* position) const override;
134  Status Read(int64_t nbytes, int64_t* bytes_read, void* buffer) override;
135  // Zero copy read
136  Status Read(int64_t nbytes, std::shared_ptr<Buffer>* out) override;
137 
138  Status ReadAt(int64_t position, int64_t nbytes, int64_t* bytes_read,
139  void* out) override;
140  Status ReadAt(int64_t position, int64_t nbytes, std::shared_ptr<Buffer>* out) override;
141 
142  Status GetSize(int64_t* size) override;
143  Status Seek(int64_t position) override;
144 
145  bool supports_zero_copy() const override;
146 
147  std::shared_ptr<Buffer> buffer() const { return buffer_; }
148 
149  protected:
150  std::shared_ptr<Buffer> buffer_;
151  const uint8_t* data_;

153  int64_t position_;
154 };
